org.xlattice.node.nodereg

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.node.nodereg.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Blocking NodeReg client for an XLattice node. If the node does not have a NodeID, this is used to obtain one from a node registration server.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Client(org.xlattice.crypto.RSAKey key)
      Create a node registry client for a node.

      org.xlattice.NodeID register(org.xlattice.EndPoint thisEnd)

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public org.xlattice.NodeID register(org.xlattice.EndPoint thisEnd)
                             throws org.xlattice.CryptoException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        Register the Node's RSA public key and a contact EndPoint with the Node Registry server. A node may have any number of EndPoints. This method registers the one specified with the server.
        Parameters:
        thisEnd - EndPoint to be registered, may be null
        Returns:
        the NodeID assigned by the server or null if unsuccessful
        Throws:
        org.xlattice.CryptoException
        java.io.IOException

      • getKey

        org.xlattice.crypto.RSAPublicKey getKey(org.xlattice.NodeID nodeID)
        Given a NodeID, retrieve its RSA public key from the server.
        Parameters:
        nodeID - Peer's NodeID
        Returns:
        its registered RSA public key

      • getNodeID

        org.xlattice.NodeID getNodeID(org.xlattice.crypto.RSAPublicKey pubKey)
        Given an RSA public key, retrieve its NodeID from the server.
        Parameters:
        pubKey - an RSA public key
        Returns:
        the NodeID that registered that key

      • getEndPoint

        org.xlattice.EndPoint getEndPoint(org.xlattice.NodeID nodeID)
        Given the NodeID of a Peer, retrieve its registered EndPoint from the server.
        Parameters:
        nodeID - Peer's NodeID
        Returns:
        the registered EndPoint
